long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fast Tools is a dynamic Chrome new tab extension designed to enhance your productivity by providing quick access to essential tools. Easily save and manage your links, notes, and to-do lists all in one place. With an intuitive interface, Fast Tools ensures that your important information is always just a click away, helping you stay organized and efficient throughout your day.

By Clicking "add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing Fast Tools new tab extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the services in terms of use https://beyondbordersit.com/Terms/ and privacy policy https://beyondbordersit.com/Privacy-Policy/ 

You may uninstall the extension at any time
To remove our extension from Google Chrome:

1) Click on the three vertical dots icon in the upper right-hand corner of your Chrome browser
2) Go to "Settings"
3) In the left menu that appears, click on "Extensions"
4) From the list of installed Extensions, locate the extension you would like to uninstall
